member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_DATA
member.summary: The CERT_BIOMETRIC_DATA structure contains information about biometric data.

summary.para: Specifies the type of biometric data. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The biometric data type is one of the predefined data types. The dwPredefined member specifies the data type.
The biometric data type is identified by the pszObjId member.

summary.para: Specifies one of the predefined biometric data types. This member is only used if the dwTypeOfBiometricDataChoice member contains CERT_BIOMETRIC_PREDEFINED_DATA_CHOICE. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The biometric data is a picture.
The biometric data is a signature.

member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_DATA.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pszObjId
member.summary: The address of a null-terminated ANSI string that contains the object identifier (OID) of the biometric data type. This member is only used if the dwTypeOfBiometricDataChoice member contains CERT_BIOMETRIC_OID_DATA_CHOICE.

member.name: CERT_BIOMETRIC_DATA.HashedUrl
member.summary: A structure that contains the hashed URL of the biometric data.
